Package com.JayPi4c.RobbiSimulator.controller.examples

Class DatabaseManager

java.lang.Object
com.JayPi4c.RobbiSimulator.controller.examples.DatabaseManager
public class DatabaseManager extends Object
DatabaseManager to manage all database related tasks.
Author:
Jonas Pohl

  • Method Details

    • getDatabaseManager

      public static DatabaseManager getDatabaseManager()
      Getter for the databaseManager to fulfill the singleton pattern.
      Returns:
      the instance of the databaseManager

    • store

      public boolean store(String programName, String editorContent, String territoryXML, List<String> tags)
      Method to store an example with its tags in the database.
      Parameters:
      programName - the name of the program
      editorContent - the code in the editor
      territoryXML - the territory encoded in XML
      tags - the tags related to this example
      Returns:
      true if the example was stored successfully, false otherwise

    • query

      public Optional<List<javafx.util.Pair<Integer,String>>> query(String tag)
      Method to get all examples identified by id and programName by their tag.
      Parameters:
      tag - the tag to search the examples for
      Returns:
      List of examples as pairs of id and programName

    • loadExample

      public Optional<Example> loadExample(int id)
      Loads an example from the database by the given id.
      Parameters:
      id - the ID of the example to load
      Returns:
      Optional containing the example or an empty Optional if no example could be found

    • getAllTags

      public Optional<List<String>> getAllTags()
      Method to load all distinct tags from the database.
      Returns:
      List of all distinct tags stored in the database

    • initialize

      public static boolean initialize()
      Initializes the database and creates the tables if necessary.
      Returns:
      true if the initialization was successful, false otherwise

    • dropAllTables

      public static void dropAllTables()
      Helper Method to drop all tables to reset the stored examples.

    • isInitialized

      public static boolean isInitialized()
      Getter to check if the initialization finished successfully.
      Returns:
      true if the manager is initialized, false otherwise

    • shutDown

      public void shutDown()
      Utility function to shutdown the database connection.
